Class AlertManager

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.proxy.ProxyManager<AlertInfo>
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.alert.AlertManager
public class AlertManager extends ProxyManager<AlertInfo>
An AlertManager is a container for AlertInfo Objects.
Author:
Gordon Parikh, Douglas Lau
